properties.name: Fairway Cafe
properties.description: Posted by System   2127 Broadway, New York, NY 10023"Upstairs from the bustling market, the Fairway Cafe is a smorgasbord of delicious delicacies to delight the youthful palate."

properties.name: Garden Cafe
properties.description: Posted by System   301 South End Avenue, Battery Park City, New York, NY 10280"The wall murals are designed to make you feel like you\'\'re sitting in a gazebo - a very big gazebo!"

properties.name: La Flor Bakery and Cafe
properties.description: Posted by System 53-02 Roosevelt Ave., Woodside, Queens, NY "The cinnamon and almond overtones of Mexican- made chocolate can be overpowering, so Chef Viko Ortiz subdues Mexican Ibarra with Belgian Callebaut to create a hot chocolate that is gutsy and refined. At for a large cup, La Flor\'\'s chocolate was the bargain of this bunch."

properties.name: Time Cafe
properties.description: Posted by System  380 Lafayette Street, New York, NY 10003"This airy, bright loft space is just right for breakfast, brunch, lunch, or dinner. There isn\'\'t a kids\'\' menu, but the staff are accomodating, and there\'\'s enough of variety on the menu to satisfy most picky palates. Booster seats, high chairs, and crayons are available"

properties.name: Time Cafe
properties.description: Posted by System  2330 Broadway, NY, NY"This airy, bright loft space is just right for breakfast, brunch, lunch, or dinner. There isn\'\'t a kids\'\' menu, but the staff are accomodating, and there\'\'s enough of variety on the menu to satisfy most picky palates. Booster seats, high chairs, and crayons are available"

properties.name: Wichcraft
properties.description: Posted by System "224 Twelfth Ave., NY, NY""A perfect balance of spice and chocolate. Pros: Not overwhelmingly sweet or chocolatey, thanks in part to infused bay leaves, which give the drink a nice kick. Cons: If you’re looking for something to warm you up on a blustery afternoon, well, this isn’t it: It’s thin and doesn’t quite hit the spot. stylishly minimalist sandwich shop, with its gleaming lablike kitchen and tantalizing melted-cheese aroma. "

properties.name: Wichcraft

properties.name: Zebulon Cafe
properties.description: Posted by System     258 Wythe Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11211"Zebulon offers a modest snack menu (with some dishes that might be a challenge to younger palates), and sometimes hosts family-friendly concerts and poetry readings."
